about_the_game:
Composed by Tyler Mire, the Shadows of Adam soundtrack is comprised of 46 wide ranging tracks harking back to the 16 bit glory days. Experience the emotional and melodic compositions that brought Shadows of Adam to life.

Included is a bonus instrumental version of "Anger of the Earth" by the Tyler Mire Big Band in addition to some other extra goodies!
